name: Overdeveloped
description:
Have you ever wanted to work at a REAL game development studio?

Well now you can, with Overdeveloped, a new multiplayer experience!

Receive orders from eccentric contractors, make designs, program, develop art and audio, and ship the game before your deadlines hit!

Time is money, so you better work fast!

Use your studio-issued Design Documents to decipher the contractors' cryptic business talk, and work together with your colleague via local multiplayer to get your game published before you go bankrupt!

Realistic game development practices!

Employ industry practices like the Agile Iterative Design Process (or AIDeP), Synthesized Sound Production, and AI-powered Artistry, to make your game the best there is! Just like in the real world, though, if you take too long the gamers will steal your money.

Why wait? Play for FREE today, and live your game dev dreams!

Download the Manual to decipher the answer to the mysteries of Game Development!

A 48-hour game jam project submitted to WolverineSoft's 2023 Shammy Jam in March 2023, around the theme "From Scratch". Credits:

Jacob Robinson - Programming

Daniel Tian - Programming

Saicharan Vemuri - Audio

Nicholas Way - Art
